title: AWS CodeWhisperer AI coder now generally available, remains free for individual developers

title: AWS' Bedrock offers foundation models to build generative AI apps
description: The new AWS cloud service, Amazon Bedrock, is designed to let enterprises select foundation models for building their own generative AI applications for targeted use cases and commercial use.

title: Bring your IOT apps to cars
description: You can start building your IOT apps for cars using driving-optimized templates from the Android for Cars App Library.

title: Fancy trying the granddaddy of Windows NT for free? Now's your chance

description: As a developer, you might be thinking, “I want to use these same AI features in my own applications”. Although the technology used to train the underlying AI models can be complex, using these models in your applications doesn’t have to be.

description: In this concept, an LLM (Large Language Model) acts as a controller, managing and organizing the cooperation of expert models.

title: Majority of US IT pros told to keep quiet about data breaches

description: With this extension, developers can develop their own semantic skills on Semantic Kernel faster and with greater ease.

title: Why WebAssembly Is Perfect for Tiny IoT Devices
description: Wasm is a lightweight, efficient, secure runtime that's perfect for devices with limited resources. It's also flexible and platform-independent, which makes it easy to develop applications for a wide range of hardware.
